subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Since the end of the 2005 season, Eagles guard Shawn Andrews has shed more than 60 pounds — from 397 pounds to 335 — motivated by the death of a close friend from a heart attack.
snippet: Since the end of the 2005 season, Eagles guard Shawn Andrews has shed more than 60 pounds — from 397 pounds to 335 — motivated by the death of a close friend from a heart attack.
